dtz-labor.name: DTZ Labor
dtz-labor.description: Labor room in Salzburg Research 2nd floor in which the dtz inventory is installed.

air_sensor.name: bluSensor AIQ
air_sensor.description: bluSensor that measures multiple air parameters.

particle_sensor.name: bluSensor APM
particle_sensor.description: bluSensor that measures particles of various sizes in the air.

hum.name: bluSensor AIQ humidity
hum.description: Relative humidity of the dtz lab''s air.

tem.name: bluSensor AIQ temperature
tem.description: Temperature of the dtz lab''s air.

dew.name: bluSensor AIQ dew point
dew.description: max. compressive dew point of the dtz lab''s air.

ObservedProperty.name: bluSensor AIQ dew point
ObservedProperty.description: maximum degree of temperature, generated by pressure, at which a state of equilibrium of condensing and vaporizing water is reached on an object

co2.name: bluSensor AIQ CO2 concentration
co2.description: Carbon dioxide concentration of the dtz lab''s air.

ObservedProperty.name: bluSensor AIQ CO2 concentration
ObservedProperty.description: Carbon dioxide concentration of the air.

tvoc.name: bluSensor AIQ air pollution
tvoc.description: Pollution of the dtz lab''s air.

pm1.name: bluSensor APM 1 µm concentration
pm1.description: Concentration of particles of size 1 µm in the dtz lab''s air

ObservedProperty.name: bluSensor APM 1 µm concentration
ObservedProperty.description: Concentration of particles of size 1 µm in the dtz lab''s air

pm2.description: Concentration of particles of size 2.5 µm in the dtz lab''s air

ObservedProperty.description: Concentration of particles of size 2.5 µm in the dtz lab''s air

pm4.description: Concentration of particles of size 4 µm in the dtz lab''s air
